name: Stable Tables
description:
A little game of restaurant service where you play a waiter who have to deliver orders.

Gameplay

You have to transport meals to customers before their timer.

You can carry up max 4 dishes at the same time.

You have 3 minutes to serve the most of meals to customers.

Controls

You have to keep your waiter stable with A and E, for keyboard, or R1 and L1 for gamepad.

You can move by WASD (keyboard) or Left stick for gamepad.

You can take orders and deliver meal with Space (keyboard) or X for PS gamepad or A for XBOX gamepad.

You can pause the game with Escape or Start in gamepad. (You have to if you want quit the game)

Bugs

You can keep a meal in your hands without customer to serve.

Difficulty can be too high

Perheaps lags ?

Comments

48 hours is so hard but so fun ! It was a very cool experience and I already want to participate to the next jam.

I made all of this game and I record it on my twitch channel, if you want !

Have fun with a cool beach music musical_note !

:thumbsup: Thanks for all of us !
